org.jasig.cas.support.saml.util

Class AbstractSamlObjectBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.util.AbstractSamlObjectBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSaml20ObjectBuilder, Saml10ObjectBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractSamlObjectBuilder
extends Object
    An abstract builder to serve as the template handler for SAML1 and SAML2 responses.
    Since:
    4.1
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed mmoayyed@unicon.net
